shadow.name: DISHONESTY
shadow.description: Sexual manipulation, strategic intimacy, using closeness as currency
shadow.behavioral_signature: Seduction without authentic desire, transactional relating
shadow.somatic_signature: Disconnection from genuine arousal, performing sexuality
shadow.thought_pattern: Intimacy is a tool. I'll use it to get what I want.

gift.name: INTIMACY
gift.description: Authentic vulnerability that creates deep bonds
gift.somatic_signature: Open sacral, genuine arousal and connection
gift.thought_pattern: I show myself fully. True intimacy requires truth.

siddhi.name: TRANSPARENCY
siddhi.description: Complete openness, no hiding, total availability
siddhi.somatic_signature: No boundaries between inner and outer
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am completely seen. There is nothing to protect.

inversion_protocols.script: You are using intimacy as a strategy because you don't trust that your authentic self is enough. Gate 59 is about breaking down barriers through vulnerability, not seduction. When you perform connection, you prevent real intimacy. The sacral knows the difference between genuine desire and strategic arousal.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Notice when you're performing vs when you're genuinely open. Feel the difference in your body.

experiment.hypothesis: If I practice radical honesty in one relationship for 5 days, deeper intimacy will emerge.
experiment.action: Choose one safe relationship. Practice saying exactly what's true, even when vulnerable.

success_criteria.target: Feeling more genuinely seen and connected
